item.description:
Resolving Your Life History

We all need to accept our life history as it has turned out. Understand and accept what has been, what lessons you've learned and the positive things that are part of your history. Let things be as they are and value the unique person you are and have been. Most people have challenges, painful experiences and some regrets. Accept that as normal and we'll look at ways to let go of the painful feelings associated with your past and how to be in the present, ok with your past.

Traditional cost $40, sliding scale to $20

7 to 9:30pm

Herb Pearce is a relationship coach, therapist, workshop leader and organizational trainer. His specialty is in understanding and resolving personality conflicts.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Resolving Your Life History
